frameset.edef: to bring together, cause to become friends

role.argrole: groups being brought together, usually marked with the prep. بين

example.parse: (SBAR-ADV (SUB_CONJ اذ) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS حفلت) (NP-SBJ (NP (DEM_PRON_F هذه)) (NP (DET+NOUN الذكرى))) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN ترسيخ) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الاخوة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG الايمانية)))) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC يوم) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS آخى) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM رسول) (NP (NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_GEN الله))) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بين) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN المهاجرين) (CONJ و) (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الانصار))))))))))) (PUNC ,)

arg.g: between the Muhajirin and the Ansar
